doc.previous: Aircraft maintenance is split between two wholly owned subsidiaries Condor Technik GmbH based at Frankfurt Airport with 160 employees for the medium long haul Boeing aircraft and Condor Berlin based at Berlin Sch nefeld Airport with 80 employees for the short medium haul Airbus aircraft
doc.after: As of April 2015 the Condor fleet consists of the following aircraft with an average age of 15 6 years 29 30  Over the years Condor operated the following aircraft types
